data.eml:eml: The oldest Vespinae from the Paleocene of Menat (France) (Hymenoptera: Vespidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nel, André, Auvray, Francis (2006): The oldest Vespinae from the Paleocene of Menat (France) (Hymenoptera: Vespidae). Zootaxa 1344: 59-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174484
